did.unittitle: School of Nutrition Faculty and Research

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Friedman School of Nutrition Science and Policy

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains annual issues of the School of Nutrition Faculty and Research from 1982 to 1987. It is an annual booklet with names of faculty, biographies, research interests, and list of selected publications. Published by the School of Nutrition.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Tufts School of Nutrition Science and Policy was established in 1981 and renamed the Gerald J. and Dorothy R. Friedman School of Nutrition Science and Policy in 2001. Its mission is to improve the nutritional health and well-being of populations throughout the world.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research
